name: Professor Madhouse
description: Professor Madhouse is an adventurous game of logic for young children.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1 Processor: Intel i3+ Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 520 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 77 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i3+ Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 77 MB available space
